content: Upload any type files from your personal device

comment.text: Upload any type of file from your personal device. This translation key is used to provide a descriptive text for a UI element that allows users to upload files from their device, appearing in an empty view container on mobile devices or as part of a dialog on desktop devices.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nahrávání souborů libovolného typu z osobního zařízení' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Czech.  'Nahrávání' (Uploading) is a gerund and sounds clunky at the beginning. A more natural phrasing would avoid starting with the verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možnost nahrát soubory libovolného typu z vašeho osobního zařízení

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lataa minkä tahansa tyyppisiä tiedostoja henkilökohtaisesta laitteestasi' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
The translation '個人デバイスからのファイルアップロード' while technically correct, is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. It reads as overly formal and clunky for a user-facing description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: 'スマートフォンのファイルアップロード' (Smartphone file upload) or 'スマートフォンからファイルをアップロード' (Upload files from your smartphone).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '개인 장치에서 모든 유형의 파일 업로드' is not a perfect representation of 'Upload any type files from your personal device'. While conveying the general idea, it's a bit literal and sounds slightly awkward in Korean. '모든 유형의' (all types of) isn't the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 개인 장치에서 파일 업로드 (Personal device file upload)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation loses the nuance of 'any type' - the Korean implies a specific list of types are being uploaded.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 개인 장치에서 어떤 파일이든 업로드 (Upload any file from personal device)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ອັບໂຫຼດເອກະສານປະເພດໃດໆຈາກອຸປະກອນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານ' is too literal and might not convey the intended meaning of 'Upload any type of files.' 'ເອກະສານ' specifically means 'documents,' whereas the English implies any file type.  A more natural translation is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບໂຫຼດໄຟລ໌ປະເພດໃດໆຈາກອຸປະກອນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබේ පුද්ගලික උපකරණයෙන් ඕනෑම වර්ගයේ ගොනු උඩුගත කරන්න.' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ පුද්ගලික උපකරණයෙන් ඕනෑම ගොනු උඩුගත කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Отпреми датотеке било ког типа са свог личног уређаја' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Upload any type of files from your personal device'. A more natural Serbian translation would emphasize 'any' in a more idiomatic way.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изузетно је важно да преведете 'any' у контексту. У овом случају, можда је боље 'Уплоад било које датотеке са личног уређаја' или 'Уплоад све врсте датотека са личног уређаја'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Передайте файли будь-якого типу зі свого особистого пристрою' is a bit formal and doesn't quite capture the casual tone of 'Upload any type files from your personal device'. 'Передайте' implies a more deliberate or official transfer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Завантажте файли будь-якого типу зі свого особистого пристрою
